code: var userReducer=function userReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'FETCH_USERS':return action.payload;case'UPDATE_CURRENT_USER':return state.map(function(state){return state._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:state;});default:return state;}};export default userReducer;
